Package org.quartz.utils.counter

Interface CounterManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CounterManagerImpl
    public interface CounterManager
    A Counter Manager that accepts a config to create counters. Creates counter's based on CounterConfig. This manages the lifecycle of a counter
    Since:
    1.8
    Author:
    Abhishek Sanoujam
